articles.description: The Eta Aquarids meteor shower is set to light up the heavens from May 5-6, peaking on Tuesday night in the Southern Hemisphere — a true highlight of the cosmic calendar.
articles.content:
While there might not be a whole lot going on in our social lives right now, this new activity is the perfect excuse to snuggle up and stay up late in your own backyard!
